programme.title: Woman Walks Ahead
programme.desc: A headstrong New York painter embarks on a dangerous journey to meet Sitting Bull but must face off with an Army officer intent on war with the Native Americans.

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: Hired to tame a rowdy Missouri bar, a Ph.D. bouncer (Patrick Swayze) romances a doctor (Kelly Lynch) and tames the whole town.

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: South London teenagers (John Boyega, Alex Esmail, Leeon Jones) defend their neighborhood from malevolent extraterrestrials.

programme.title: The Rover
programme.desc: After thieves steal his car, a hardened loner (Guy Pearce) forces a wounded member (Robert Pattinson) of their gang to help him track them down across a scorched and perilous landscape.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: Tormented by her peers and sheltered by her religious mother (Julianne Moore), an awkward teenager (Chlo Grace Moretz) unleashes her hidden, telekinetic powers after a sick prank at her senior prom pushes her over the edge.

programme.title: Life After Beth
programme.desc: A guy (Dane DeHaan) discovers that his girlfriend (Aubrey Plaza) has returned from the dead, but his joy turns to horror as she slowly undergoes a horrible transformation.

programme.title: Dim Sum Funeral
programme.desc: The grown children of an overbearing Chinese matriarch reluctantly gather to take part in seven days' worth of traditional funeral rites.

programme.title: Dim Sum Funeral

programme.title: Obvious Child

programme.title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: While Sonny sets his eye on a second property, new arrivals, a lack of space and the demands of a traditional Indian wedding threaten to engulf Evelyn, Douglas, Muriel and the others.

programme.title: How to Talk to Girls at Parties

programme.title: She's Out of My League
programme.desc: An airport security agent (Jay Baruchel) must figure out how to make the relationship work when a beautiful, successful woman (Alice Eve) falls in love with him.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror

programme.title: You're Next

programme.desc: A medical intern (Milo Ventimiglia) discovers his colleagues are playing a deadly game in which one commits the perfect murder, then the others compete to find the cause of death.

programme.title: Houdini's Last Secrets
